website_summaries.verdict: A selfie stick and tripod in one capable of capturing a 360-degree angle.
pros: Noted for its sturdiness and ability to limit wobbling where the phone sits
Used by professionals who need industry-ready images with equipment that's easy to pack and transport
We love the Bluetooth technology and remote functionality as well
cons: Compatible with only generation 7 and higher on certain smartphone models

customer_reviews.title: Never buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Never buy this product. Doesn’t stay still fall down. It looks good but doesn’t work that good. I just broke my brand new iPhoneX display wow
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Hanif

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect purchase to take my dog’s Instagram filming to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect purchase to take my dog’s Instagram filming to the next level. My boyfriend hasn’t always had the time to help me with filming, but this thing gives me another set of hands!! Just what I needed and perfect. It holds up my iPhone 7 well even when I point it completely down towards the ground. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made! Fantastic Product Design
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick was - Extremely well made - converts into a very stable tripod - Has a wireless remote, which fits into the tripod. This is very good design because usually for all my selfie sticks, i keep losing the wireless remote. - You can charge the wireless remote- which is fantastic coz the last selfie stick i had, there was no way to charge the remote. It was more like use and throw. I highly recommend this product. No cons so far. Fantastic for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I bought this a couple months ago and tried for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple months ago and tried for an event yesterday. It doesn’t appear to work as adve. While the yoozon appears to pair with my iPhone 7, it doesn’t activate camera shutter to take photos. I’ve looked all over the web for a manual or instructions to be sure I’m doing this right but no info! Cannot find anything under yoozon. Is there an app to download? Help! I plan to return although I’m apparently outside amazons return policy. :-(
customer_reviews.author: donna c

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the selfie stick. It feels sturdy seems to be made with good quality materials. The Bluetooth remote links seamlessly with my phone 4 easy picture taking. The stand is sturdy enough to hold my larger-sized phone without me worrying about it tipping over. the telescoping handle is fairly tight as to reduce wiggle and motion when it's fully extended. I like how the Pivot Point has a tightening knob on it to keep it sturdy when walking with it extended
customer_reviews.author: Running_Fool

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT WORK WITH 8 PLUS
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT work with Iphone 8 PLUS. The phone holder doesn't extend enough for the phone to fit. Returning- and annoyed at the false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for iphone 7+, 8+ (bigger sizes). It can't balance them when placing on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: The tubings are too loose. When extend the stick ...
customer_reviews.text: The tubings are too loose. When extend the stick, mount the phone and position the self stick into vertical possition and set one the ground the tubes will slide down and drop the phone lower. The clamp that holds and mount the phone to the stick is also way too loose. Sorry for the 1 star due to the fact that lots of improvements needed. You all out there you can try one yourself but the piece i got is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: Updated: The manufacturer sent me free replacement that is currently working. I appreciate the effort to reconcile the issue. Good customer service. It has stopped working after 6-months with very use (Approximately 3-4 times). The remote lights up red for several seconds when plugged in, but either it won’t charge or won’t connect after be left to charge for hours. You get what you pay for I suppose, but it didn’t seem like an item that should be too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Initially worked but stopped holding the charge within a day and on 10 day vacation. Lost out on 9 vacation days. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sad about it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The same day I use it for the first time it broke where it holds the phone, it seams as the screw loose.
customer_reviews.author: DrGG

customer_reviews.title: Give it a shot!
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this product one star because it was not, I felt, what I was led on to believe it was. However, the customer service was absolutely fantastic and completely made up for the misunderstanding. If the product doesn’t work out for you, know that you are in good hands and they will take care of you!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Not a five star product
customer_reviews.text: How did this Tripod receive 4.5 stars with over 1000 reviews? It was hard to use the phone mount for my iPhone 8 Plus. Once I finally got the phone on, it could barely stay. I finally gave up and took the phone out. These positive reviews are not trust worthy. Many people received the products for free so they gave out 4-5 stars reviews in return.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Read the other reviews if you need hints on how to use it. My only criticism is that the tripod seems a little shacky but if your careful it should not be a problem. Folds up very well for travel. Holds by 7+ with a battery charger case and works with my wife's iphone x.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Forrest "Mac User"

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable. Not sturdy at all. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so unreliable. The whole trip you have to figure out a good angle while keeping it sturdy. The phone is too heavy for this lightweight tripod. I regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zuly Yamileth Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Remote stopped working on the third recharge
customer_reviews.text: Useless withouth the remote. Had to use the 10 second delay photo each time because at the third time the remote control was unable to recharge again.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love the design, but the remote/power button no longer works after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this selfie stick I liked and was worth paying a little more for: the integrated tripod, the bluetooth power/remote that can detach from the stick, the feel and heft of the product. But after only 6 months of very light use, the remote no longer works, even when fully charged. So now I am left with a non-functioning stick. So disappointing and feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: North of 30

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth disconnects if traveling in zones with no cellular data
customer_reviews.text: While this fits perfectly in one’s hand, if you’re on vacation and visiting remote areas like National Parks where you do not readily have cellular data, the Bluetooth constantly unpairs itself every time the phone turns itself off after inactivity. Therefore every time you go to take a picture, you have to re-connect the Bluetooth first. Pretty annoying and a definite design flaw. If you plan to use this in populated areas where cellular data is abundant, then you should have no problem. However for us that was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Casey

customer_reviews.title: I really like this set-up
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set-up. I thought there was going to be 2 pieces, a tripod and a selfie stick, it's actually one piece of equipment that doubles for both functions. I much prefer that. The tripod is solid, and the blue tooth clicker works great for video or photos.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Howard

customer_reviews.title: Tripod legs uneven making tripod feature unsafe to use
customer_reviews.text: Was very enthusiastic about this product until I opened it works well as selfie stick but tripod legs are uneven and unusable barely stands on its own will constantly tip over and causing danger to using phone. One of the main reasons I was looking to use this was for a tripod feature very disappointed that it will not serve its purpose. Tripod legs extend to high upwards on two legs not giving good stability and not being even on all sides could be a issue with mine or just basic build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Descretion is key

customer_reviews.title: My newest, favorite gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I really debated on which selfie stick to buy. I was looking for a tripod and read all the reviews for so many of them. I didn't want to make a choice and be unhappy with it. I don't like nor do I have time to return stuff. So glad I chose this one!!!!! It's super sturdy. The blue-tooth button is attached to the main body so you don't lose it. I have several camera apps downloaded on my phone. This blue-tooth hooks up with each and every one of them. And it hooks up IMMEDIATELY! Also, I like that the blue-tooth button recharges via a USB port rather than a battery. Love this new toy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Imaredheadedone!

customer_reviews.title: Universal Holder
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Father's Day gift for my Dad who is always taking pics and often has a time setting up a "stand" for the ones he wants to be in as well. I can not attest as to it's functionality at this point. However, I was pleased to find this would fit a variety of phones as my Dad has a tendency to misplace, drop in the lake etc. and is always getting a new phone. With this, no matter what phone he gets, this should fit any phone he gets.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: Almost great selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this selfie stick a few months ago. It was very easy to pair with my iPhone and very easy to use. I love the fact that but bottom opens up like a mini tripod and can be used when not too windy to take pics, while standing away from it. The only downsides: (1) The remote is very easy to lose and they don't sell a replacement, and (2) It won't turn sideways so you can only take landscape selfies, not in portrait orientation But other than that, I'm very happy with it. (Please sell the remotes!!)
customer_reviews.author: TrollHntr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Selfie Stick with wireless remote and tripod
customer_reviews.text: We bought the selfie stick just before setting off to an overseas holiday. When we received the package we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of workmanship, sturdiness and the features. We paired it with Samsung A8 phone which has a superb selfie camera. The results have been outstanding. Both the removable remote control and the tripod are extremely useful features. The Yoozon selfie stick has performed flawlessly since we bought it and we have so far clicked more than a thousand photos. Look no further for a high quality, feature laden selfie stick at very reasonable price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gita Shenoy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good....A little over 24hrs in
customer_reviews.text: Decent pod. BT works good. Very little - made out of plastic. Hinges a bit sketchy tho, you might always want to loosen the screw for the phone holder so you dont accidentally break it when you want to collapse/unfold it. Very prone to snapping off at that point. Packaging was nice and simple. Tripod stand was decent, not for clumpsy handling tho. Be careful with this and you might use it for a nice extended period, if you dont accidentally snap-off one of the stands or holder. I'd recommend to a careful buyer. 3.5 stars for me more out of sleekness and design than durability. Nice for travel...
customer_reviews.author: Monalyzd7

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Love the remote and the tripod but the selfie camera holder is very unstable. The weight of the phone makes the phone swing down when trying to take a photo... happens too often to make this a reliable selfie stick!!! Looking for one with the same features but that will hold the phone.
customer_reviews.author: xosallyoh

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our trip to Glacier National Park a few months ago, knowing that there wouldn't be a lot of other people around to ask for help taking pictures. We used both the selfie feature and the tripod feature with an iphoneXr and neither disappointed, especially for the price! We left the lodge with the remote fully charged and were out for about 8 hours and never ran out of charge. And we used it A LOT in that 8 hour period! We were super impressed with how far you can be away from your phone on the tripod and still be able to use the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a vacation we took back in June & it was a great thing to have on hand, the concept is great! I have an iPhone 7 Plus & it fits however when I hold the stick out, it sometimes flops down. The remote was awesome to have until it ran out of charge & I could never get it to charge back up again. Maybe I got a bad stick, all of the other reviewers have great things to say. I am so sad because I was really excited about this selfie stick, I wanted it to be the favorite in my collection.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-Purpose Stand
customer_reviews.text: Item Arrived In A Timely Manner (Prime Delivery) And In Excellent Condition. Initially Purchased Item To Replace Another Stand I Had. Easy To Use. Main Component (Vertical Stand/Center Column) Very Sturdy. Tripod Legs Not Very Sturdy, However Center Column Provides Support. -First Picture: Tripod Use. -Second Picture: Second Picture Shows The Detachable Bluetooth Remote To Take Pictures. -Third Picture: Tripod Stand Holding iPhone 8+ On Spring Loaded Holder. -Fourth Picture: Selfie Stick On Standby. -Fifth Picture: Selfie Stick Extended. (Extends About 1.5ft) Phone Holder Rotates For Horizontal Or Vertical Viewing And Tilts Forward And Backward. *Recommend For The Price
customer_reviews.author: Kapitan

customer_reviews.title: Fragile, doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Used with galaxy S8 with a case. Spring loaded phone clamp plastic cracked after a half dozen uses. So I made a new one specifically for my phone with my 3d printer. Then tripod feet started not sitting level. So I made a exteranal leg stop ring on 3d printer. It's useable again. If one more part fails I'll probably trash it. Never used the blue tooth shutter release as S8 has a voice activated shutter option.
customer_reviews.author: ColoSpgs

customer_reviews.title: Not the most compact, but by far the best value!
customer_reviews.text: I like the functionality, and the price simply cannot be beat. It's priced a good 40% lower than similar items here on Amazon. The only drawback is that when folded, there is a protrusion on the side, making a little lumpy when put in your pants pocket. It's otherwise fine for a jacket pocket or bag. If your looking for clever and versatile selfie stick/tripod/remote control at the lowest price, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it never held a charge enough to turn on the remote and connect to Bluetooth. The tripod feature worked well and the remote slid out nicely. Customer service was very responsive, said it was defective and sent another one right away. But the new one has a remote that is close to impossible to remove which is a big issue because you must remove it to charge the button that connects via Bluetooth. Also, the tripod feature is less stable in the second one they sent me. Too bad, it’s a nice idea for a product but with two defective ones in a row I can’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Perfect for travel... It's light and it does rotate vertically and horizonally :)
customer_reviews.text: very light tripod and selfie stick combined with bluetooth remote control. The bluetooth and remote control worked right from the box... very light perfect for travel. It's plastic but doesn't look cheap at all... but of course you need to take care of it if you want it to last. I also have the manfrotto travel tripod that is good quality but heavier so the plastic version is ok with me, good for long walks... Just hope that this will last :)
customer_reviews.author: Tranceformer

customer_reviews.title: Like remote storage
customer_reviews.text: I like that the remote is stored on the Stick but my iPhone seems to be too heavy to hold in one position; It flops around. May return this item. UPDATE: COMPANCY CONTACTED ME VIA EMAIL ASKING ME TO CHANGE MY REVIEW TO FIVE STARS. AFTER CHANGING IT, THEY TOLD ME TO SEND AN EMAIL THAT I CHANGED IT, THEY WOULD VERIFY THE CHANGE TO FIVE STARS AND SEND A NEW ITEM. I DID NOT DO MAKE ANY CHANGES.
customer_reviews.author: HM53

customer_reviews.title: Great! Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This works great with my Galaxy 10. It is very adjustable...sturdy...and melds into a small size for transport. Yo do not need an app to pair. Just hold the button until it blinks and it is steadily recognizable on your phone in pairing mode. I did notice that it did not work with one or more addon camera apps...but was perfect with default camera. It is possible that available apps might be different.
customer_reviews.author: Randy I

customer_reviews.title: Kept falling down
customer_reviews.text: This holder is so light and it couldn't handle my Samsung Galaxy phone. It kept falling down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! Can I tell you all, that this is the best and only selfie stick you'll ever want. I absolutely loved the ease of use. It took all of a few seconds to pair and works great. I love taking pictures and a friend said that as she was surprised I didn't already owned a selfie stick. I did some thorough research and this was my choice. I'm having so much fun. Plus the remote capability and the built in tripod is an added feature. The reviews were on target. Don't hesitate but and try it yourself, you'll understand my excitement @@
customer_reviews.author: L. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great travel accessory! Bluetooth pairing is simple. Has nice range and is sturdy when holding. Tripod is a little flimsy, especially when extended, but will hold well on most hard and level surfaces. Detatchable remote feature is awesome! The only glitch I had was that when I wanted to power down and save the battery life, it wouldn't shut off. Even then, however, one full charge got me through each day (12-14 hrs no problem). I used it with an iphone 7plus, with a silicone case, for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: The phone holder is very difficult to put the phone in and out. I am not sure if I will keep this product or not because of this reason. Anything else seems to be OK. It paired easily. The tripod is not very stable so if you expect it to be mostly tripod, you may reconsider. As a selfie stick, it seems to be fine. I am just not happy with the phone holder.
customer_reviews.author: Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use at a destination wedding in Cancun. I used it at beaches, on boats, on off-road vehicles and the adjustable phone holder felt very secure holding my Samsung Galaxy s10+ (even with an X-Doria Defense Shield case). The remote paired easily to my phone via Bluetooth and even came with a charging cable. My only complaint would be that there is a a slight delay from when you press the remote exposure button until when the actual exposure is taken on your phone. Otherwise, a good product at a good value!
customer_reviews.author: Mar Apuya

customer_reviews.title: It could have some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Pros: thick handle for good grip, holds the phone, Bluetooth remote easy to use and put back, sleek design, easily packed in a backpack Cons: manufacture can add more instructions like a user guide (like how do I know when the remote is done charging?), I wish it was made of metal instead of “metallic” colored plastic, has a hard time fitting my iPhone XS with Otterbox case. It will hold it but there’s a lot of tension.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Strong well built that handles an S9 Plus with case
customer_reviews.text: Very strudy yet compact stick. Extension segment stay in place and very rigid when used at any length with my large Galaxy S9 Plus with case used with it. Remote charge seems to last a long time. Remote works with native camera app and 3rd party apps. Lag is the usual bluetooth lag for the time it takes the app to register pressing the remote button. Which is fast. Phone clamp is strong, rotates, and holds position excellent. Tripod function is handy but as it is small, be careful to balance it well with a large heavy phone and only on a hard flat surface like a desk or table. Excellent compact selfie stick!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: Love this selfie stick. It can be used as a tri-pod or classic selfie stick that telescopes out nicely and allows the phone to be cradled securely for either landscape or portrait. The blue tooth feature is particularly wonderful as the remote (which sits nice and securely in stick when not in use as remote) allows for ease with group shots, video etc can be done with ease rather than reaching and manually clicking the button. Only thing I don't care for is the loud 'click' of the remote which can be heard in videos.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Can I say, I literally just got this on my door step 2 hours ago and I am ready to send it back, but I tore up the box opening it, so I guess I am stuck with this CRAP. I did not realize when I was ordering this that you can only turn your phone in one direction. Uggh the last selfie stick I bought from Amazon was a dud as well. I guess I will either need to invest in quality or just find other ways to take Selfies. I dont even have the heart to re-gift this to someone else. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: t. arneil

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend. Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Solidly made . PROS - Easy to set the phone into it - Easy to establish the Bluetooth connection - Easy to snap photos - Extension on the arm insures good photos - Stable base with eh triopd CONS - Hard to get the FOP out of the base
customer_reviews.author: Phenolic

customer_reviews.title: Used it a couple of times and really like it
customer_reviews.text: The selfie stick is pretty cool because it hasn't broken and meets my needs. The tripod function is nice, although definitely not a professional tripod. We were able to set up the phone on the tripod, slide out the remote Bluetooth shutter release button and take some group photos. I like the rechargeable shutter button that is integrated into the handle yet also removable. I also like that when the device is collapsed, it holds the remote in place.
customer_reviews.author: wpdoc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Was at a friends brunch recently and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Was at a friends brunch recently and we took a group photo of about 15 girls and she set it up in about 30 seconds and used the remote to take a few pictures effortlessly! Everyone loved it and after i saw hers i ordered my own :) I am very happy with my purchase and find it to be very well made! My only complaint is as a Tripod it seems a little wobbly sometimes but once you balance it then it works great. The remote is my favorite part and will make group photos at parties a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Greatlyrandom

customer_reviews.title: Feels quality
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this little thing is awesome. Totally compact, feels very quality. WHAT IT DOES is when you press the button, it activates the up volume button, so while not all phone cameras take a picture when you hit the volume button, there are plenty of camera apps, like snapchat, that support this function
customer_reviews.author: Donna Stanziola

customer_reviews.title: PICK THIS ONE! HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this selfie stick. Everything about it is great. Very high quality, well executed design and an easy to use blue-tooth feature. The remote control is great and I love that the stick itself has a place to hold the remote when not in use. I went on a trip this past weekend and used it for my 5th vacation this year. I pulled it out and immediately said out loud, "man, I love this selfie stick!" That's when I knew I needed to write a review. Highly, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: snanna

customer_reviews.title: be extremely careful with the remote
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, very simple to use, easy to carry, and sync with I phone for remote picture taking, however, you must be extremely careful when extending the selfie stick as the remote can easily fall out of its place-holder. If the remote is lost it renders the device useless as was the case with me. On my first day using the stick the remote slipped out of its place and was lost while taking photos in a wooded and swampy area rendering the stick useless. In creating the device a small built-in magnet on the back of the remote could have solved this problem.
customer_reviews.author: language barrow

customer_reviews.title: Had it awhile now, just keeps on working
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is great. I wanted a multi-use selfie/tripod and this has been one of the best purchases I've made. I've used it at work to take group photos as a tripod and then I've used it as a selfie stick to capture picks of me and my cats. I have yet to have it not work properly and I've had it for quite awhile. The only thing that could make this better, is if they made a fancier model that also allowed you to use the remote to take video along with photos. I'd pay more for that, but I'm super happy with what I have.
customer_reviews.author: L. R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!  Great for vacations.
customer_reviews.text: My first selfie stick and ordered specifically for going out of the country. I find if your a couple traveling, it’s nice to take your own photos. The remote control is only good on the US or if you have Bluetooth capability. If your out of the country it’s great and better than imposing on others to take your photo, and the tripod capability is very nice if time permits. It takes a bit to adjust if you never used one but once you learn, it’s a lovely addition to any vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Campanaro

customer_reviews.title: Had to send this back. When I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to send this back. When I used it for a tripod (which is why I bought it) it toppled over with the weight of the phone. This is designed poorly in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Compact And Extremely Handy
customer_reviews.text: I started making YouTube vidoes and I wanted something I could use as some sorta stabiliser when I'm doing shots and also something to prop my phone up on n use. It does all that. *NOTE* if you're looking for something to use when your taking 'stand-up v pictures, this won't work because it's very short. Length = (2ft some inches) Aside from that the remote works well, connects and snaps pictures / records videos without lag. It's an awesome selfie stick - Tripod
customer_reviews.author: Awesome-One

customer_reviews.title: Great little selfie/ tripod stick!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gadget that acts as both a selfie stick and tripod in one! The removable shutter button is very handy that connects through blue tooth.Only wish that the clamp portion was designed with a sliding fixture as oppose to a clamp spring like fixture. Positive capture of my camera can be better verified using a sliding fixture. I worry with the spring that the my cell phone might slip out! I use this with my iPhone 7 Plus which Is larger than most cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: madmom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one on 1/2018 , but used it only one time on my vacation in 3/2018 . Then the Bluetooth did not connect to my iPhone 8+ . I was really disappointed and was give up to claim it because I thought it over the period date for return. But, I just noticed that this has 18 months guarantee . I contacted with the customer service and got an immediately response and a NEW replacement AFTER 10 MONTHS from the date I purchased. OWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICCE !
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not very good at all
customer_reviews.text: This item is only good as a selfie stick. I actually purchased it for the tripod capabilities and it is pretty useless because it is not bottom-heavy enough, so once you place the phone, and start angling it the way you want it, the tripod is not stable and falls over.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back.
customer_reviews.text: This was used once and then the battery in the remote died. I thought it was my own fault but now after three more failed uses I realize it is not my error. Yesterday we charged the remote clicker for 8 hours. I turned the stick on and used it to test and then turned it off. Just now (24 hours later) when I tried to turn it on to use it it’s dead. I’m sick and tired of not being able to use this when I need it. My return window has passed and I am extremely annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No rechargeable battery
customer_reviews.text: So this is my second Yoozon selfie stick. The first one was confiscated from security at the Phoenix Arena. I loved it and had it for two years. It was convenient to total around and never had an issue with it. I loved it and had it for two years. It was convenient to total around and never had an issue with it. This one just arrive but unlike my other one it doesn't have rechargeable remote. The last thing I want is to be on vacation looking for a battery to replace my selfie stick battery. I sent back immediately upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Must have for group trip pics!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah buddy! I’ve always made fun of selfie sticks. That is until one of my besties brought this little gem on a girl trip! Perfect! We used it every which way! Horizontal, vertical, on the tripod w the remote! So, naturally I had to have one too! This thing is so easy to use. Easy to pair w your phone, easy to set up on the tripod, easy to remove and replace the remote. And folds up so nice and small to stick it in my purse. This thing is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPhone 8plus
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my iPhone 8 Plus. I will return
customer_reviews.author: Buying Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Worth it. Hands down. It’s so easy to use, and can be used in so many ways. You can use it as just a selfie stick to take a picture with a friend, or you can use it to take a big group picture. I’m giving it a 4 start rating only because the length of the stick is much shorter than an old-school selfie stick. And on a windy day, the tripod does not stand well at all. You also need solid ground. We’ve been able to make it work by piling stuff on the legs to keep it up-right. But it’s something to note!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: this is a great selfie stick/ tripod stand to take photos without asking people to do it. the remote is a bit confusing because you can turn it on and off; I realized that after using it for 2 days. the stand is not that tall so you have to be creative with your photos. it's also not that heavy so a little wind will tip your tripod over. overall this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get some good pictures with my Redmi Note Pro when I'm with groups. The instructions are a little confusing, but just follow the pictures and you will be fine. The only thing I'm worried about if how the Bluetooth remote turns off, I feel like it will die quickly. How to turn it off is not in the instructions either. They do give you an extra battery for the remote. It is worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shakeera

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality materials, folds up like a transformer, bluetooth remote control to my Samsung Galaxy S9+ cell phone. Really worth the money! Does everything they said it would do. I really love the way the stand folds out on bottom. Very cool design! I am a retired Mechanical Designer and Engineer of 42 years, my opinion someone did a excellent job on this design! I am into photography, and this is a great addition to my equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Tripod leg with weak construction
customer_reviews.text: Few days of usage, one of the legs was "broken". The leg is still attached but goes beyond the point where it is supposed to stop. So the entire thing stands up but leans heavily towards the broken leg... The other part of the stick is working though..
customer_reviews.author: S Kim

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and comes with a tripod!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this selfie stick. It's not as tall as I would like it to be, but I just put it on top of something (5 gallon bucket upside down works lol) and it takes great pictures. It's very sturdy and well made and not as flimsy as my previous one. I have an iPhone 8+ and it fits the massive phone. Bluetooth remote works great as well. Very useful when youre out and about as it folds small.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: So Easy a 4yo can use it with good results
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work and decided to upgrade my old selfie stick, this Selfie stick is well made and super easy to use, unfortunately it is so easy to use that my 4yo daughter has taken it from me, set it up as her tripod and has started taking selfies on my old phone. At 1st the pictures were expected then within an hour she was taking incredible pictures especially when she figured out the remote doesn’t need to be held in front of her
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The most neat product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most neat product I have ever purchased. - This can be both selfie stick & tripod. - Bluetooth shutter button can be attached to the stick, so you do not have to worry to lose it. - Bluetooth shutter button can be charged by USB, so no need to worry about battery consumption. - When not in use, everything can be stored in small stick.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, unsturdy, poor connection.
customer_reviews.text: Not very long, made of cheap plastic. The Bluetooth clicker is awful. It's like you have to reconnect the Bluetooth if you wait even 5 seconds between using it. Tripod very unsturdy. It will fall over very easily. Because the plastic is so light, putting your phone on top makes it top heavy. I wasn't expecting top quality with this price, but I was expecting better than this. Going to send it back and try to find a better one.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Phone holder issue
customer_reviews.text: For the look and feel, the product does have strong points. But my main issue was the phone holder. It does not extend well making it very hard each time I place the phone in. I had a feeling it will break if I put any force. Don’t know if I received a defective one as when I searched for the youtube review, the holder extend very smoothly without any major force needed. Was hoping to use it for family travel :(
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best selfie stick I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight, easy to put in your purse or bag, SUPER easy to use and the best part, that little remote charges with a USB cable... Truly my most favorte gadget for long trips, group fun and selfies.. I have bought several for gifts and have easily influenced the purchase of atleast 20+ more from the last 2 conferences I have been too. This is well worth the money ! I wish I could brand them with my company name somehow and give them to clients...haven't figured that one out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Best selfie stick!
customer_reviews.text: Best 20$ I've spent! I take it everywhere I go! Fits perfectly in my purse or pocket. I actually purchased the same selfie stick one year ago and recently had to throw it away at an NFL game. I wasn't aware that we weren't allowed bring in selfie sticks. So I literally had to give it up. Ordered another one 30 min later during the Texans game last week! I have been using this selfie stick for a year to record all my son YouTube videos.
customer_reviews.author: JJ and Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Easy to Use but Doesn't Last or Fit Bigger Phones
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well at first. I had some trouble fitting my One Plus 6T with a phone case. Once you stretch it as wide as possible, the phone can fit into the selfie stick. In the tripod mode, the stick will no longer hold itself up. The stick will just slowly go down over time. The remote works well, but there is always a noticeable lag (about 1 second). Not bad for the price, but this definitely wasn't built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Baylan  T

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly well made
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality of this product after getting used to the usual Chinese made dross out there - don't know where this is made but the quality is great. Has a high quality feel to it of something three times this price. Bluetooth works great. Holds an iPhone X in place with ease (and thats a heavy phone). Tripod feature is sturdy and easy to use. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Mournblade14

customer_reviews.title: Hope to use soon.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product I haven't had the opportunity to use it for its function, I had no issues linking the Bluetooth remote and my Galaxy S9 Plus it's but probably is the max of the phone holding portion. The product seems to be extremely durable and will more than likely last for a few years. The remote is rechargeable and does not require the purchase of batteries, score. I hope to use this soon so I can provide functional feedback. I hope this information assist in your decision-making process, thank you for your time and have a wonderful day.
customer_reviews.author: John Y.

customer_reviews.title: Portion that holds your phone is not strong
customer_reviews.text: The tripod is good and light but the mount that holds the phone is not sturdy. It falls into fixed positions with no tightener causing the phone to sit crooked, especially the larger phones which has heavy weight and due to the the fingers that hold the phone are spread out, you leave the phone top heavy so you do not hit volume buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Koz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i need!
customer_reviews.text: i was going on vacation and i realized i need a selfie stick but Bestbuy had some really bad stuff and the cheapest was over $50 i needed something that would extend to where i needed but also be able to be used as a tripod which this did and omg really durable it holds the weight of my phone with the extended battery as well on it and the remote control bluetooth just fits the design perfectly. you know someone really just wanted to design one of these things to fit their life.
customer_reviews.author: Howie Doin

customer_reviews.title: Very intelligent design.
customer_reviews.text: Quick setup. Great response to the remote. Super portable. Fantastic design—very practical. Love the features. It’s not always as sturdy when set up as a tripod on surfaces that aren’t perfectly level, but it’s unlikely you’ll attempt to set it up on the lawn like I did. Haha. Not sure why “face recognition” is one of the ratings categories. As far as I can tell, that has nothing to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: A good selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? It's solid, easy to use, convenient, the handle becomes a tripod for use when you want to place the camera (cell phone) in a stable position, and has a detachable remote control (bluetooth) button for activating the camera — especially useful when taking a group selfie and you need the camera further away than the selfie stick reaches. I haven't compared this selfie stick to others, but it meets expectations and does so much.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Stones

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can use it portrait or landscape with your phone and the remote avoids arms in the photos ! We took it on vacation and used it several times for mountain scenery in the background. It extends a good distance!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this!! Excellent quality for the price point! Quite simple to use. Very compact—in fact so compact, I thought I’d forgotten to pack it and didn’t find it in our bag til the last few days of our trip 😂😂🤦🏽‍♀️ The remote synced easily and quickly. Can charge with a battery pack too which is great on-the-go. Tripod pops open well and stays in place. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Winward

customer_reviews.title: Looove this! Favorite gadget purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite gadget purchases ever!!! I love this thing!! Sets up quickly and easily. Very quick to pair with your phones. Good distance connectivity with the remote. If you have a pop socket or ring on the back of your phone, the placement of them may make seating the phone securely in the holder challenging... just place the accessory lower on the phone case, or remove the phone from the case while using. Works great for a tripod for group photos, and as a selfie stick. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: K REID-ALL

customer_reviews.title: Very compact design, and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I have taken loads of selfies with this.. the remote feature is super easy... the charge holds for a rather long time.. It's a bit small, especially if you are using it for a tripod. I have a heavy Iphone 8+ with a case, so I have to pay special attention to the balance when using the tripod feature. My phone is just a brick.. but it works very well...
customer_reviews.author: Samala

customer_reviews.title: Horrible tilting when flipping the phone from portrait to landscape mode
customer_reviews.text: Everything is in working order as indicted on the item description. One major flaw that makes this unusable for me is the fact that when I flip the phone horizontally (from upright/vertical position) unless the phone clamp is positioned on the middle of the phone, it tilts. There’s no adjusting or stabilizing the clamp to keep it from tilting. It is worse when you add any lens on the phone. I feel this makes the whole process time consuming when you have to constantly adjust the phone in order to keep the mount from tilting with or without the additional lens on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Matters

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Is very small to carry, specially while traveling is very handy and compact. Used so many times and working with big and heavy or small-light phones. Is very easy to pair and the little switch is easy to hide while you are taking pictures and is re-chargeable, so need to look for batteries, which great while traveling. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Araiza

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea Combining Selphy and Tripod. Well Done
customer_reviews.text: I have had several selphies but this one intrigued me with the built in tripod. No more asking a stranger to take your picture! I was pleased with the size and weight And obvious good quality of the product. My wife carries it in her purse (the others were too bulky or heavy for her to take in purse). The unit arrived as promised and when I had a question the customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Newman

customer_reviews.title: The best selfie stick ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have shared this product with friends. So far, I have bought almost ten ones for friends' demend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger, Hsu

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly great little tripod that's easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: This was unexpectedly great. It's come in handy so many times, not just as a selfie stick, but for long exposure pictures, or just when you need a stand for your phone. The fact that the remote slides into the body of the tripod prevents it from getting lost, it grips the phone nicely, and it's surprisingly sturdy when extended. It turned out to be a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Stick - Tabletop Tripod, Take the pic REMOTELY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I really enjoy how easy it is to use, and how the tripod element is part of the handle. The remote is small enough to palm and strong enough to reach signal wise to make group picture taking a breeze. The only draw back is that getting my Iphone 8 plus into the “clamp” seems a bit stiff. If the spring had just a bit more give that would be good... but then again perhaps it will loosen with time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than your average selfie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my solo trip to Greece! This did not disappoint. This very easy to use and I was able to take multiple shots without asking someone. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love the functionality and all the features! Clamp fits the iPhone perfectly, my nexus is stretching it to the limit. Remote connects every time. Tripod is the most useful feature! I use it when Skyping/FaceTiming. Only downside is the size/weight. I end up not bringing it half the time because It’s too bulky for my purse or too heavy to add to my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Eva W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, not quite perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is as-described, and the detachable remote was a breeze to enable. That was the main reason for my purchase. The tripod is a useful feature, but it's rare among selfie sticks in that it DOES NOT have provision for attachment to a full sized tripod. That limits its usefulness, as does the relatively short extension. Nevertheless, a good and useful and satisfactory product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this after I used my friend's for a bit. I love that you can use it as a tripod AND as a selfie stick! Sometimes I just use the tripod and put it on my kitchen countertop as I'm cooking and can keep the recipe out for easy access. I like that it folds up and is easy to take around. Will be bringing this with me on any trips, as well as any time I might need to take pictures with people. No longer have to ask random strangers to take our picture!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Converts to a little tripod.
customer_reviews.text: - It is compact and easy to travel with. - Very sturdy way more than others that I've had in the past. - The grip to hold your phone is also very secure. I was able to extend it and take pictures from angles that I normally wouldn't have been able too. - Easy to Rotate from Vertical to Horizontal. Bonus it's also a very decent Tripod. Depending on the size of your phone. I used it when it was a little windy with my Galaxy S 10 and it would tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Isidro Lopez

customer_reviews.title: convenient and easy to use since small to carry it’s always in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, light weight, convenient and easy to use since small to carry it’s always in my purse Love love this product very much I bought another 1 for my friend and love it too. Thank you YOOzon
customer_reviews.author: sassy&Me

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is light weight and hold the phone nice and tight. I’m able to live stream while walking all different places and can still read things from my phone. This selfie stick is able to be all different lengths and glides smoothly to change length. It’s small and can fit in a purse or Fanny pack. Stands up on its own and is very sturdy. I would highly recommend this and will buy again if mine ever breaks. I’ve been using it for about two months now and have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can not hold iPhone 10 , my phone broke because of this product
customer_reviews.author: dhathri

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to take pictures of myself while on a solo vacation in Oahu. This product made it very difficult to do that. The Bluetooth only allows you to take a few steps away from the tripod before it shuts off and you end up posing for pictures that are never actually being taken. I walked back and forth from the tripod to a spot ahead to get a picture and would have to go back and reset the Bluetooth too many times to count. Very frustrating! Also the tripod was not very sturdy and would fall down easily with a slight breeze and it was difficult to get it in a position where it would stand easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Anne

customer_reviews.title: How can I get a spare BlueTooth Module
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this Yoozon unit. I disagree with those who claim an iPhone 8 is too big. I have an iPhone XS Max and it works in portrait and landscape mode just fine. I have one concern. I’d like to purchase a back up Bluetooth unit, but cannot figure out how to contact the company to get one. Anybody out there know how to get such a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Chazz

product_meta.title: Yoozon Selfie Stick Tripod Bluetooth, Extendable Phone Tripod Selfie Stick with Wireless Remote Shutter for iPhone SE 2/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/Xs MAX/XR/XS/X, Galaxy S20/Note 10/S10/S9, Google and More
feature_bullets: 【HATE IT WHEN CARRY A HEAVY SELFIE STICK?】Yep, screwing a monopod selfie stick with a heavy tripod, is a pain. Our lightweight foldable selfie stick was designed to eliminate this to make a ordinary Selfie Stick lighter but more functional.

【HOW IS THE TRIPOD INTEGRATED AS ONE?】Gently slide the WIRELESS REMOTE from stick (at the “YOOZON” logo part).It takes 3 seconds to make the TRIPOD appear just simply unfold the bottom part of the selfie stick. Ingenious design which makes the tripod open or close in one step. Fantastic way to start your selfie happiness.

【HOW DOES IT FIT VARIOUS OCCASIONS?】Extendable length from 10 inches to 28.7 inches so you can choose your desired length.Compact pocket size design, which is easy to carry. With 360°rotation, you simply twist the cradle head or phone holder to take photos, video call or live broadcasting , to meet your different needs, or situation.
【360°Rotable Design】 Design with 360 degree rotatable phone holder, you could rotate it and select horizontal or vertical camera mode to get the best angle to take photos.

【WHY CHOOSE OURS?】Our customers come first. No quibble, 18 months warranty which covers all Yoozon products. BETTER SELFIE STICK, ZERO RISK is not just a slogan we care about our customer experiences. Choose Yoozon if you want a quality, service and a memorable selfie experience. We back with your 100% customer satisfaction.【 With Bluetooth Certificated Declaration ID:D051632,Model: Oth-AB402】

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,910 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
